metadata.title: CVE-2024-27390 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:mcast: remove one synchronize_net() barrier in ipv6_mc_down() As discussedin the past (commit 2d3916f31891 ("ipv6: fix skb drops inigmp6_event_query() and igmp6_event_report()")) I think thesynchronize_net() call in ipv6_mc_down() is not needed. Under load,synchronize_net() can last between 200 usec and 5 ms. KASAN seems to agreeas well.
